entry.value: insert into lakehouse.etladmin.etl_ngaychaydulieu_tichhopc12 (ngay_chaydulieu,ngay_chaydulieu_gannhat,thoigiancapnhat) select t.ngay_hientai as ngay_chaydulieu, t.ngay_chaydulieu_gannhat, CONVERT_TIMEZONE('Asia/Ho_Chi_Minh',current_timestamp) as thoigiancapnhat from ( select etl_date_c12.ngay_chaydulieu as ngay_chaydulieu_gannhat, etl_date.ngay_dulieu as ngay_hientai from lakehouse.etladmin.etl_ngaychaydulieu_tichhopc12_lichsu etl_date_c12 join lakehouse.etladmin.etl_ngaydulieu etl_date on 1=1 QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 1 ORDER BY etl_date_c12.ngay_chaydulieu DESC) = 1 ) t where t.ngay_chaydulieu_gannhat < t.ngay_hientai

select count (*) as flag_trigger from ( select etl_date_c12.ngay_chaydulieu as ngay_chaydulieu_gannhat, etl_date.ngay_dulieu as ngay_hientai from lakehouse.etladmin.etl_ngaychaydulieu_tichhopc12_lichsu etl_date_c12 join lakehouse.etladmin.etl_ngaydulieu etl_date on 1=1 QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY 1 ORDER BY etl_date_c12.ngay_chaydulieu DESC) = 1 ) t where t.ngay_chaydulieu_gannhat < t.ngay_hientai
select * from etladmin.vw_ord_etl_job_tichhopc12 where loai_job = 'pre_process' and group_ord= ${pp_group_start}

outputPorts.name: out_done_prep_c12
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'out_done_prep_c12'' is invalid because Port has no outgoing connections

outputPorts.name: out_writelog_post_c12
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'out_writelog_post_c12'' is invalid because Port has no outgoing connections

entry.value: select * from etladmin.vw_ord_etl_job_tichhopc12 where loai_job = 'post_process' and group_ord= ${pp_group_start}

insert into lakehouse.etladmin.etl_log_tichhopc12 ( thoigianbanghi_taidich, ngay_dulieu, ten_api, IdBanghi, trangthai_tichhopc12, phienban, xml_content ) values( '${thoigianbanghi_taidich}', to_date(${ngay_dulieu}/1000), '${ten_bang}', '${IdBanGhi}', ${trangthai}, ${PhienBan}, '${file_Content}' )
